"Imagine" by John Lennon - This song is an anthem for peace and unity. It reminds us to dream big and strive for a world where everyone can live together in harmony.
"Good Vibrations" by The Beach Boys - This upbeat song has a contagious energy that lifts the spirits and encourages one to enjoy the good things in life.
"The Middle" by Zedd, Maren Morris & Grey - A song about finding oneself amidst the chaos of life. It's an empowering reminder to keep moving forward despite the difficulties.
"Don't Stop Believin'" by Journey - An inspiring rock song that motivates listeners to never give up on their dreams, no matter how daunting they may seem.
"Hallelujah" by Jeff Buckley - A soulful and emotional ballad that speaks to the human condition, encouraging reflection, gratitude, and connection with others.
